    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1222</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Yom Kippur (Sefer Yonah)1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Yom Kippur (Sefer Yonah)1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Yom Kippur (Sefer Yonah)1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Yom Kippur (Sefer Yonah)1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Yom Kippur (Sefer Yonah)1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Yom Kippur (Sefer Yonah)1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Yom Kippur (Sefer Yonah)1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, learners read chapter one of Sefer Yonah and are introduced to the conflict between Yonah and God.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Sefer Yonah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mincha on Yom Kippur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">maftir</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion lesen Anfänger Kapitel eins von
Sefer Yonah und werden zur $überschneidung zwischen Yonah und Gott 
eingeführt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants lisent le 
chapitre un de Sefer Yonah et sont présentés au conflit entre Yonah 
et Dieu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os learners lêem o capítulo um de
Sefer Yonah e são introduzidos ao conflito entre Yonah e deus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, i principianti leggono il 
capitolo uno di Sefer Yonah e sono introdotti al conflitto fra Yonah 
ed il dio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι αρχάριοι διαβάζουν το κεφάλαιο 
ένα Sefer Yonah και εισάγονται στη σύγκρουση μεταξύ Yonah
και του Θεού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los principiantes leen el 
capítulo uno de Sefer Yonah y se introducen al conflicto entre Yonah 
y el dios.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sefer Yonah</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mincha auf Yom Kippur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">maftir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sefer Yonah</string>
          </keyword>
